articles.description: Jujutsu Kaisen Season 2 is coming our way with new episodes later this Summer, and to celebrate Jujutsu Kaisen has released a new trailer showing off more of what fans can expect from Season 2 and when to expect the new episodes! Gege Akutami's original Jujut…
